Package primitives

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClosestPair
    Finds the pair of closest points using different algorithms.
    Line
    Represents a line by means of three coefficients a, b and c, where ax + by + c = 0 holds.
    Point
    Represents a point in two dimensional space.
    Segment
    Represents a segment.
    SegmentsIntersect
    Determines whether the two given segments intersect in O(1), as depicted in "Introduction to Algorithms" by T.Cormen et al.
    Vector2D
    2D vector entity.
    Vertex
    Represents a node of the skin of the model
